text: Good Evening
Hello there. how are you?
I am doing well! How are doing today?
I am doing pretty well. thanks for asking!
I'd like to tell you about a great program I am working on!  Have you ever heard of Save the Children?
I may have in passing, but could you tell me more information about it?

Save the Children is a non-governmental organization that operations world wide raising funds through partners and donations to fight for children's rights and provide relief and support for children in developing countires.
Sounds interesting and something worth donating towards a good cause. Would you donate to this fund?
I would and I have!  9 out of every 10 dollars goes directly to a child in need.
That is great to know. Any additional information you could tell me about the Save the Children program?

Absolutely!  There are a variety of ways to be a part of the program outside of donations.  They have a program to sponsor a child in need, you can throw a fundraising event or participate in events such as triatholons to raise funds, or help advocate for children.
Thank you for the information. What is the best way I could get involved with this charity?
You are more than welcome to donate today and your donation will be sent to Save the Children to go towards programs that help the children directly.
Great. How much are the donations?
You can donate up to two dollars of your payment, but more is always appreciated!
Alright. $2 sounds good enough. Could I get a web address to the fund if I have any more questions?
Thank you so much for you generous donation!  To answer any more questions the link is  URL
Thanks you. I will be more than glad to donate.
You're welcome and thank you!  Have a great rest of your evening!
thank you. you too.
